description: This file defines an ApplicationsProvider class for managing job applications. It fetches data from an API and maintains state such as loading status, error messages, and the list of applications, intended for use within a Flutter app.

classes.name: ApplicationsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider that manages fetching and storing job application data from an API, and notifies listeners of state changes.

methods.name: fetchApplications
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the user's job applications from the API, updates the state accordingly, and handles parsing errors.
